episode.title: 大好き! 私のうっちゃん
I Love You! My Dear, Dear Ukyo
Kampf der Geschlechter
À la recherche d`une sœur
Alla ricerca dello scritto segreto
Daisuki! Watashi no Ucchan
episode.summary: Ranma receives a challenge letter from Tsubasa Kurenai. Ranma agrees to a competition selling Ukyo`s food at school, over Ukyo.

episode.title: また一人 乱馬を愛したヤツ
Ranma Gains Yet Another Suitor
Und noch eine Braut!
Encore une fiancée pour Ranma
Amore e Focacce
Mata Hitori Ranma o Aishita Yatsu
episode.summary: Akane thinks that the words spoken during a mysterious attack on Genma mean he has an illegitimate son -- Ranma`s half-brother.

episode.title: 黒バラの小太刀! 純愛一直線
Kodachi the Black Rose! The Beeline of True Love
Notstand im Hause Tendo
Prête à tout pour l`amour
L`amore di Kodachi
Kurobara no Kodachi! Jun`ai Icchokusen
episode.summary: The dojo is running low on food. Ranma goes out, trying to bring in students to the dojo, but Kodachi creates a competing dojo.

episode.title: 怪談! 乱馬と魔性の剣
Ghost Story! Ranma and the Magic Sword
Dämon Kuno
La chasse au fantôme
Storie di spiriti - La spada incantata
Kaidan! Ranma to Mashou no Ken
episode.summary: Furinkan H.S. is haunted. While searching the school at night, Ranma and company are attacked by a mysterious swordsman.

episode.title: 右京のスカート大作戦!
Ukyo`s Skirt! The Great Girly-Girl Gambit
Eifersucht ist eine Leidenschaft
La transformation de Frédérique
Ukyou no Skirt Daisakusen!
episode.summary: When Ukyo comes to school dressed as a girl, Kuno takes an interest. Ukyo ends up in a cooking contest with Shampoo, Kodachi and Akane.

episode.title: 魔女が愛した下着ドロボー
The Witch Who Loved Me: A Japanese Ghost Story
Die Hexe, die mich liebte
Une mission impossible
Una ragazza particolare
Majo ga Aishita Shitagi Dorobou
episode.summary: Soun is asked to guard a haunted bra at an antique shop, but Happosai wants it.

episode.title: 熱愛? 良牙とあかね
Ryoga & Akane: 2-Gether, 4-Ever
Bäumchen wechsel dich
Roland et Adeline
Il gioco delle parti
Netsuai? Ryouga to Akane
episode.summary: Ukyo tries to set up Ryoga and Akane, to eliminate her as competition for Ranma.

episode.title: 八宝斉 最期の日?
The Last Days of Happosai...?
Alles hat ein Ende...
Une potion pour le maître
Gli ultimi giorni di Happosai...?
Happousai Saigo no Hi?
episode.summary: The class fortune-teller, Miyo, foresees that Akane and Ranma will be married within the week. Happosai falls ill and seems to be dying.

episode.title: 一粒コロリ・絶倫ホレ薬
All It Takes Is One! The Kiss of Love Is the Kiss of Death
Perle mit Nebenwirkung
Le bracelet magique
Le perle dell`amore
Hitotsubu Korori Zetsurin Horegusuri
episode.summary: On the beach, Happosai turns up with a bracelet that contains three love-potion pills. One lasts for a minute, one a day and one a lifetime. Akane swallows one.

episode.title: 乱馬, ついに呪泉郷へ行く
Ranma Goes Back to Jusenkyo At Last
Zurück nach Jusenkyo!
Ranma et la source de l`incantation
Viaggi nel tempo
Ranma, Tsui ni Jusenkyou e Iku
episode.summary: Happosai`s magic mirror is used to send Genma, Ranma and Happosai into the future, and then back to Jusenkyo before falling into the springs.

episode.title: 強くなりすぎた良牙
Ryoga the Strong... Too Strong
Der stärkste Mann der Welt...
Le cadeau empoisonné (1)
Tsuyoku Narisugita Ryouga
episode.summary: After sharing his food with an old hermit, the man repays Ryoga by making him the strongest man in the world. But is it worth the price?

episode.title: おもてに出やがれ!
Step Outside!
Der kleine Yotaro
Le petit garçon et le panda
Omote ni Deyagare!
episode.summary: Off to the mountains to find a Christmas tree for the Master, Ranma and Genma become separated. When Ranma and Akane go looking for him, they find him living in luxury as a panda, having been adopted by a rich woman as a playmate for her sickly son.

episode.title: 良牙, 愛と苦悩を越えて
From Ryoga with Love
Ein neues Schwein
Partage entre amour et peine
Ryouga, Ai to Kunou o Koete
episode.summary: Ryoga has a dream about Akane while spending the night in a cabin in the woods after getting lost. Ryoga reminisces about Ranma, how he`s come to transform into a pig, and how his feelings for Akane have grown over time. Source: hulu

episode.title: 決戦! 乱馬復活なるか?
Showdown! Can Ranma Make a Comeback?
Die große Revanche
Le retour de Ranma
Lo scontro finale
Kessen! Ranma Fukkatsu Naru ka?
episode.summary: Armed with the "Hiryu Shoten Ha", Ranma goes after Happosai. But the old master, knowing something is up, keeps his temper, rendering the attack useless unless Ranma can figure out some way to get him really worked up...

episode.title: らんまと九能の初キッス?!
Ranma and Kuno`s... First Kiss
L`épée légendaire
Ranma to Kunou no Hatsu Kiss?!
episode.summary: Kuno`s got a magic sword capable of granting 3 wishes, and Ranma smells a cure for his curse. The "upperclassman" has already used two of them... How far is Ranma willing to go to get the third?

episode.title: 帰ってきた変態校長
The Return of the Hawaiian Headmaster from Hell
Die Rückkehr des Direktors
Le retour du directeur
Il ritorno del preside
Kaette Kita Hentai Kouchou
episode.summary: Furinkan High`s principal returns from a long trip to "study" American educational system, unfortunately he turns out to be completely insane. His first order of business is to institute a policy of buzz cuts for boys and bowl cuts for girls unless the students can find the coconut with a "get out of rules free" note in it...

episode.title: 良牙の天道道場居候日記
Ryoga`s "Tendo Dojo Houseguest" Diary
Nachhilfe für Ryoga
Roland, le nouveau membre de la famille
Ryouga no Tendou Doujou Isourou Nikki
episode.summary: Ryoga decides to try to enroll at Furinkan High, though first he has to pass the placement test. Akane agrees to tutor him, but with all the commotion that happens in the Tendo Dojo on a regular basis, can he manage to keep his mind on his studies?

episode.title: フィアンセは化け猫
My Fiance, the Cat
Von Katzen und Bräuten
Ranma sort ses griffes
Fiancee wa Bakeneko
episode.summary: Shampoo shows up with an oversized bell for Ranma, claiming it`ll make them fated to stay together forever. The bell however turns out be cursed, carrying the spirit of Maomorin - the giant ghost cat, looking for his bride.

episode.title: 登場! 史上最強の九能
Enter Kuno, the Night-Prowling Knight
Ritter Kuno ohne Fehl und Tadel
Le grand combat de Julian
L`imbattibile Kuno
Toujou! Shijou Saikyou no Kunou
episode.summary: To help him carry out his new position as Furinkan High`s Moral Guardian, Kuno turns to Happosai for training.

episode.title: 八宝斉の恋!
Happosai`s Happy Heart!
Happosai ist verliebt
Le maître est amoureux
Happousai no Koi!
episode.summary: Happosai falls head over heels in love with a pre-school teacher, but is he willing to give up the underwear stealing for her sake?

episode.title: 吹けよ風! 青春は熱血だ
Blow, Wind! To Be Young Is to Go Gung-Ho
Frischer Wind in alter Schule
Roulez jeunesse
Fuke yo Kaze! Seishun wa Nekketsu Da
episode.summary: The Principal hires a new teacher, who takes it upon himself to get Ranma and Akane to openly express their feelings towards each other while they`re still young.

episode.title: 乱馬が弱くなっちゃった!
Ranma Gets Weak!!
Das Geheimnis des Brennkrauts
La marque de faiblesse
Ranma perde la forza
Ranma ga Yowaku Nacchatta!
episode.summary: Furious at Ranma for delivering him into the hands of a mob of angry women, Happosai brands Ranma with ancient mark, causing him to become "as weak as a mere babe". Upon hearing this, his enemies start lining up to give him a beating... What`s poor Ranma to do?

episode.title: あやうし! Pちゃんの秘密
Close Call! P-Chan`s Secret
P-Chans Geheimnis
Un secret bien gardé (2)
Ayaushi! P-chan no Himitsu
episode.summary: Terrified that Akane has figured out that he`s really P-Chan, Ryoga tries to leave the town forever. Ranma continues to try to figure out a way to beat Ryoga, while Akane tries to force him to tell her what he knows about the mark shared by Ryoga and P-Chan.

episode.title: 九能ボー然! 恋の大予言
Extra, Extra! Kuno & Nabiki: Read All About It!
Ein hinterhältiger Wahrsager
Julian et les prédictions
Kunou Boozen! Koi no Daiyogen
episode.summary: A fortunetelling friend of Sasuke`s divines that Nabiki is the girl Tatewaki is destined to spend his life with. Still torn over having to abandon Akane and "the pig-tailed girl", Kuno starts to court Nabiki, who naturally welcomes the opportunity to milk him for everything he`s worth.

episode.title: 恐るべき新弟子現わる
A Formidable New Disciple Appears
Der Musterschüler
Un nouveau venu
Osorubeki Shindeshi Arawaru
episode.summary: A young man is awestruck when he sees Happosai in action, and seeks out the Tendo Dojo, wishing to become a student of Anything Goes Martial Arts. The master accepts, and it soon becomes apparent that he`s a very dedicated pupil... at bit too dedicated if you ask Ranma.

episode.title: 乱馬のママがやってきた!
Here Comes Ranma`s Mom!
Mutterliebe
La mère de Ranma
La mamma di Ranma
Ranma no Mama ga Yattekita!
episode.summary: A mysterious woman shows up at the Dojo, having long conversations with Genma. Is it really Ranma`s mother, come to take him away to live with her?

episode.title: 完成! とんでもない必殺技
Eureka! The Desperate Move of Desperation
Die Technik des Himmelsdrachens
Le meilleur de Ranma
Il dragone leggendario
Kansei! Tondemonai Hissatsuwaza
episode.summary: Just as Ranma is about to give up, Cologne gives him hope in the form of the "Hiryu Shoten Ha", a devastating technique he can use even in his weakened state... if he can manage to learn it.

episode.title: たまごをつかむ男
The Egg-Catcher Man
Sébastien
Tamago o Tsukamu Otoko
episode.summary: Kasumi seems unusually cheerful after a chance encounter with a stranger, leading Nabiki to speculate that she`s found herself a new boyfriend.

episode.title: 乱馬がいないXmas
A Xmas Without Ranma
La complainte du panda
Ranma ga Inai Xmas
episode.summary: Ranma isn`t home yet due to an important business and Akane goes out looking for him. Shampoo, Kodachi and Ukyo end up looking for him to because they want to spend Christmas Eve with Ranma alone.

episode.title: スイカ島の交際鬼
The Date-Monster of Watermelon Island
L`île aux pastèques
Suikatou no Kousaiki
episode.summary: Kuno washes up on the beach, with a watermelon on his head and suffering from amnesia.

episode.title: もうあなたから離れない
Master and Student... Forever!?
Le pot de colle
Mou Anata kara Hanarenai
episode.summary: Happosai`s plan to teach Ranma some manners backfires, when the magic pill he took makes them stick togeter - litteraly.

episode.title: 天道家, 遊園地へ行く
Tendo Family Goes to the Amusement Park!
Le parc d`attractions
Tendouke, Yuuenchi e Iku
episode.summary: Dr. Tofo gets a free pass to an amusement park and invites Kasumi, who takes the rest of household with her. Once there, the money starts flying, and suddenly they discover that an unwanted guest has eaten their lunch.

episode.title: 偽り夫婦よ永遠に...
Ukyo`s Secret Sauce, Part 2
Faux semblant (2)
Itsuwari Fuufu yo Eien ni...
episode.summary: Trying to keep Ukyo off his back, Ranma goes along with Nibiki`s plan, pretending that he and Akane are already married. She`s not the kind of girl who gives up easily however, forcing the "newlyweds" to keep up the charade around the clock.

episode.title: 乱馬はヘタクソ? 格闘書道
Ranma`s Calligraphy Challenge
Applique-toi pour écrire
Ranma wa Hetakuso? Kakutou Shodou
episode.summary: A master of martial arts calligraphy is about, so far undefeated. Naturally, Ranma wants to change that, but finds it difficult when the man will only accept challenges from people with beautiful handwriting.

episode.title: 雪ん子冬物語
A Cold Day in Furinkan
Aventure hivernale
Yukinko Fuyu Monogatari
episode.summary: After a night of sudden snowfall, Ryoga shows on the Tendo`s doorstep, half frozen to death and rambling about a giant snow monster.

episode.title: 呪泉郷から来た悪魔 前編
The Demon from Jusenkyo, Part I
Faute de nom (1)
Jusenkyou kara Kita Akuma: Zenpen
episode.summary: Akane is kidnapped by a pantyhose wielding youth capable of turning it to huge winged monster.

episode.title: 追跡! 手まり唄の謎
A Teenage Ghost Story
La chasse au trésor
Tsuiseki! Temariuta no Nazo
episode.summary: When Akane reads out aloud words of an old notebook in Toramasa`s store, the ghost of a teenage girl appears, reciting a haunting rhyme.

episode.title: 風林館高校, 影のドン登場
The Secret Don of Furinkan High
Le vieux marchand du collège
Fuurinkan Koukou, Kage no Don Toujou
episode.summary: Deep within the bowels of Furinkan High, Ranma discovers a second school store, run by a crazy old man with a secret the Principal is desperate to keep from getting out.

episode.title: 大変! あかねが入院した
Akane Goes to the Hospital!
Le pied dans le plâtre
Taihen! Akane ga Nyuuin Shita
episode.summary: Distracted by Ranma scuffling with Gosunkugi, Akane gets a bone fracture during gym class and has to spend the next few days in Dr. Tofu`s clinic. Everyone comes to visit her... except Ranma, who just can`t decide what he`s going to say to her.

episode.title: 呪泉郷から来た悪魔 後編
The Demon from Jusenkyo, Part II
Faute de nom (2)
Jusenkyou kara Kita Akuma: Kouhen
episode.summary: There`s water everywhere as Ranma, Ryoga, Shampoo and Mousse try to take Taro`s cliff top hideout and save Akane.

episode.title: 五寸釘! あぁ恋の紙人形
Gosunkugi`s Paper Dolls of Love
Les poupées de papier
Gosunkugi! Aa Koi no Kaminingyou
episode.summary: Gosunkugi sees a chance for a date with Akane when he obtains a set of magic paper dolls, capable of forcing someone to obey whatever command is written on them when they`re stuck to the individual`s back.

episode.title: 悲願! 普通の男に戻りたい
Back to the Way We Were... Please!
La poudre miracle
Higan! Futsuu no Otoko ni Modoritai
episode.summary: Ranma, Ryoga and Mousse each get a bag of magic powder. One of them is capable of curing their curse - the others can turn them into anything...

episode.title: 謎の暴れタコツボ現る?!
Mystery of the Marauding Octopus Pot!
Vous avez dit
Nazo no Abare Takotsubo Arawaru?!
episode.summary: Soun, Genma and Ranma are hired to rid a seaside resort of the nasty marauding octopus pot that has been terrorizing the guests.

episode.title: 小太刀のマイラブリーパパ
Dear Daddy... Love, Kodachi!
Retour du père
Kodachi no My Lovely Papa
episode.summary: Kodachi is shocked to learn that the Principal is her father. When she invites him to stay at the Kuno residence, the scene is set for her brother`s worst nightmare.

episode.title: らくがきパンダの呪い
Curse of the Scribbled Panda
C`est Noël
Rakugaki Panda no Noroi
episode.summary: While fighting with his father over a takoyaki, Ranma accidently sets free three unspeakably evil spirits, one of which is a living panda doodle that wants a date with him.

episode.title: 格闘茶道! さらわれた家元
The Missing Matriarch of Martial Arts Tea!
L`indigne héritier
Kakutou Sadou! Sarawareta Iemoto
episode.summary: Sentaro shows up fearing for his life, wanting Ranma`s help to rescue his kidnapped grandmother.

episode.title: 風林館高校・通り魔事件
Case of the Furinkan Stalker!
Le farceur masqué
Fuurinkan Koukou Toorima Jiken
episode.summary: A masked man sporting a black pigtail is stalking the girls of Furinkan at night, with Ranma being the prime suspect.

episode.title: あかねの心がわからない
Akane`s Unfathomable Heart
Le garçon qui lisait dans les pensées
Akane no Kokoro ga Wakaranai
episode.summary: A young boy capable of reading people`s minds shows up at the Dojo, but gets upset when nobody believes in his talent, and starts taking it out on Ranma.

episode.title: 早乙女流の跡継ぎは良牙?
Ryoga Inherits the Saotome School?
La course au titre
Saotomeryuu no Atotsugi wa Ryouga?
episode.summary: Furious at Ranma for eating his sweets, Genma decides to make Ryoga his disciple and heir.

episode.title: 乱馬と右京がソース相愛?
Ukyo`s Secret Sauce, Part 1
La sauce de Ranma (1)
Ranma to Ukyou ga Sauce Souai?
episode.summary: After 10 whole years of fermentation, it`s finally time for Ukyo to try out the special okonomiyaki sauce she made as a child. Unfourtunaly it tastes so horrible that she collapses, and the Tendos take her in while she recovers. While she`s there, Akane grows increasingly jealous, especially since Ranma is going out of his way to be nice to someone he claims he just sees as a childhood friend...

episode.title: 強敵? 五寸釘くん登場
Enter Gosunkugi, the New Rival!?
Un nouveau rival pour Ranma
Kyouteki? Gosunkugi-kun Toujou
episode.summary: While trying to save him from one of Akane`s lunches, Ranma inadvertently becomes the object of the wrath of one Hikaru Gosunkugi... the most incompetent Voodoo-practicing geek the world has ever seen.

episode.title: 幸せのパンダ伝説
Legend of the Lucky Panda
La légende du panda
Shiawase no Panda Densetsu
episode.summary: While out in the wilderness, Genma falls into a river and hits his head. When he wakes up he finds himself in an earlier time, near a village inhabited by familiar faces.

episode.title: 玄馬, 家出する
Genma Takes a Walk
Querelles
Genma, Iede Suru
episode.summary: After a disagreement over the rules oh Shogi, tensions between Soun and Genma rise, until Genma moves out of the Dojo, taking Ranma with him...

episode.title: 乱馬はなびきの許婚?
Nabiki, Ranma`s New Fiancee!
Le fiancé d`Amandine
Ranma wa Nabiki no Iinazuke?
episode.summary: Furious at both Ranma and Nabiki, Akane tells them to go marry each other. Much to her surprise, Nabiki decides to her younger sister up on the offer.

episode.title: 良牙! 夕日に向かって走れ
Ryoga, Run into the Sunset
Roland alias Harry
Ryouga! Yuuhi ni Mukatte Hashire
episode.summary: While out on one of his journeys, Ryoga gets taken in by a farmer and his daughter who`s convinced he`s the legendary hero "Joe", come to save them from the crooks that have been terrorizing the area.

episode.title: マリアンヌになった九能
Kuno Becomes a Marianne
À la recherche de Marianne
Marianne ni Natta Kunou
episode.summary: Azusa becomes convinced Kuno is a tanuki, a legendary creature with magical powers, and promptly adopts him as her "Marianne". Ranma and Akane are just happy that the two are keeping each other busy, until Azusa starts to suspect Akane wants to take her new pet away form her again.

episode.title: 佐助のスパイ大作戦
Sasuke`s "Mission: Improbable"
L`espion qui venait de nulle part
Sasuke no Spy Daisakusen
episode.summary: Dissatisfied with Sasuke`s performance as protector of the household, Kuno gives him a final chance to prove himself - arrange a date with the pig-tailed girl.

episode.title: 乱馬, ミーツ・マザー
Boy Meets Mom, Part 1
Ranma et sa mère (1)
Ranma, Meets Mother
episode.summary: Genma receives a note from Nadoka, his wife and Ranma`s mother, that she is coming over to the Tendo`s for a visit. But why is Genma so terrified?

episode.title: カエルのうらみはらします
The Frogman`s Curse!
La danse des grenouilles
Kaeru no Urami Harashimasu
episode.summary: A strange old man with a small army of pet frogs comes to town, and he`s keeping his eyes on Ranma. Is it really the Frog Hermit, and mysterious stranger with the ability to turn people into frogs?

episode.title: 格闘茶道・家元立つ!
The Matriarch Takes a Stand
La grande cérémonie
Kakutou Sadou Iemoto Tatsu!
episode.summary: Sentaro need`s Ranma`s assistance once more, as the Daimonji matriarch prepares to do something so dangerous, so unpreceded, that the result is sure to be catastrophic...

episode.title: これが格闘茶道でおます
The Gentle Art of Martial Tea Ceremony
La cérémonie du thé
Kore ga Kakutou Sadou de Omasu
episode.summary: Ranma is kidnapped by Sentaro - a practitioner of Martial Arts Tea Ceremony, looking for a bride. To determine the bride`s suitability, she has to defeat his grandmother, and as usual, Ranma`s completely incapable of walking away from a challenge.

episode.title: 天道家消えたたこ焼きの謎
Case of the Missing Takoyaki!
La chasse au voleur
Tendouke Kieta Takoyaki no Nazo
episode.summary: Everyone is a suspect as the denizens of the Tendo Dojo try to figure out which of them ate the newly bought box of delicious octopus puffs.

episode.title: 夢の中へ
Into the Darkness
Bienvenue dans mon rêve
Yume no Naka e
episode.summary: Something strange is in the air, as one by one the members of the Tendo household fall asleep and enter a twisted dream world controlled by Happosai.

episode.title: 九能帯刀, 代理校長を命ず
Tatewaki Kuno, Substitute Principal
Le proviseur intérimaire
Kunou Tatewaki, Dairi Kouchou o Meizu
episode.summary: Aloha the Principle decides he needs a vacation. He leaves Kuno on in charge not because Kuno is his son (so he says), but to give Kuno the opportunity to show responsibility. Kuno declares himself a champion of virtue. He runs into some trouble trying to enforce a school rule of no close personal relationships between sexes on school grounds.

episode.title: 乱馬なんか大キライ!
Ranma, You Are Such a Jerk!
Leçon de cuisine
Ranma nanka Daikirai!
episode.summary: Akane runs away after Ranma ruins her anniversary dinner, and the entire household has to spend the rest of the night looking for her.

episode.title: ボンジュールでございます
Bonjour, Furinkan!
Surprenant
Bonjour de Gozaimasu
episode.summary: A french nobleman comes to Soun and Genma to collect on an old debt, demanding one of their daughters as a bride. Having been beaten by him at "battle dining" previously, Ranma volunteers, hoping for a chance to get even.

episode.title: シャンプーの赤い糸
Shampoo`s Red Thread of Dread!
Le fil rouge de l`amour
Shampoo no Akai Ito
episode.summary: Ranma suddenly falls head over heels for Shampoo when she ties him to her with the magical Red Thread of Fate. Just a few more hours and the effect will be permanent, and Akane doesn`t care one bit... does she?

episode.title: 逆襲! 怒りのお好み焼き
Revenge! Raging Okonomiyaki...!
Pâte à crêpes
Gyakushuu! Ikari no Okonomiyaki
episode.summary: When a crêpes cook steals all her business, Ukyo starts to doubt her prowess as an Okonomiyaki maker. Under the guidance of a monk from the Temple of the Satisfied Stomach, she beings an intense training program, leaving Ranma and Akane to mind the store...

episode.title: レオタードは乙女の呪い
A Leotard Is a Girl`s Burden
La course aux trésors
Leotard wa Otome no Noroi
episode.summary: Out to prove that martial arts rhythmic gymnastics is a manly sport for manly man-like men, a group of boys are stealing the local team`s special gymnastics treasures. Naturally, it`s up to Ranma to strike a blow for womankind and get the treasures back.

episode.title: 道場破りは女の子?
And the Challenger Is... a Girl?!
Le retour aux sources
Doujouyaburi wa Onnanoko?
episode.summary: A mysterious gang of martial artist using old fashion toys as weapons are about, and one of them, a young girl, challenges Akane for the Dojo`s sign... and wins. Can Akane manage to win it back?

episode.title: 対決! 乱馬VS影乱馬
Ranma Versus Shadow Ranma!
Peur de son ombre
Taiketsu! Ranma Tai Kage Ranma
episode.summary: Ranma buys a magical incense supposed to let him increase his skills by training against his own shadow. At first it works great, but then it becomes apparent that the shadow has a mind of it`s own.

episode.title: 男の野望が尽きる時...
When a Guy`s Pride and Joy Is Gone
Couper les cheveux en quatre (2)
Otoko no Yabou ga Tsukiru Toki...
episode.summary: Ranma gets no peace at all, as everyone`s after the Dragon Whisker. Things get even more tense as he learns that if he doesn`t get it back soon, he might just run out of hair - permanently.

episode.title: 乱馬, 月夜に吠える
Ranma`s Greatest Challenge!
Ernestin fait des siennes
Ranma, Tsukiyo ni Hoeru
episode.summary: Ranma and Happosai team up to conquer the Ogre Festival of the Dark. Happosai prepares Ranma personally for the match of his life. If Ranma loses The Ogre Festival of the Dark it will be the end of the Anything-Goes School of Indescriminate Grappling. Winning the tourney, the true horror of the situation is revealed.

episode.title: リンリン・ランランの逆襲
Ling-Ling & Lung-Lung Strike Back!
L`attaque des deux sœurs
Rinrin Ranran no Gyakushuu
episode.summary: Honorbound to remain single until their big sister marries, Ling-Ling and Lung-Lung return to Japan armed with an even deadlier technique, determined to eliminate all of Ranma`s other fiancées.

episode.title: ディナーはリングの上で
Dinner at Ringside!
Dîner sur le ring
Dinner wa Ring no Ue de
episode.summary: With the wedding date fast approaching, Ranma`s only hope is to master the fearsome Parley du Foie Gras and beat Picolet at battle dining.

episode.title: ムース故郷に帰る
Mousse Goes Home to the Country
Le départ de Mathias
Mousse Kokyou ni Kaeru
episode.summary: After betting it all on a final fight with Ranma, Mousse loses and is forced to give up on Shampoo and go home to China. But before he leaves, he`s determined to make Shampoo happy by forcing Ranma to give up his other suitors.

episode.title: ナンパになった乱馬
Ranma the Lady-Killer
Ranma et le pansement magique
Nanpa ni Natta Ranma
episode.summary: Under the influence of a magic bandage, Ranma starts hitting on every girl in sight, and Ukyo and Shampoo are determined to remain within his field of vision.

episode.title: 恐怖の混浴温泉
The Mixed-Bath Horror!
L`Hôtel de la Clairière
Kyoufu no Kon`yoku Onsen
episode.summary: An invitation takes Ranma and the rest to a run-down hot-springs resort. But what are those strange noises in the bathhouse... Is it really haunted?

episode.title: 絶叫! 温泉バトル
Hot Springs Battle Royale!
Les retrouvailles
Zekkyou! Onsen Battle
episode.summary: A hotsprings resort is having a big obstacle course race as a PR gimmick, with the first prize being a trip to another resort of the contestants choice. Seeing a chance to get back to Jusenkyo, the whole gang enters, unaware that the resort is trying their best to stop anyone from winning, since they`re broke and can`t afford to pay for the prize...

episode.title: 気分しだいの必殺技 (前)
From the Depths of Despair, Part I
Une technique incomparable
Kibunshidai no Hissatsu Waza (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Shishi Hoko-Dan… the Lion`s Roar Blast! Better than the construction specific "Breaking Point" technique (which worked only on rocks), Ryoga`s new move has got Ranma on the run. Can he get away fast enough?

episode.title: 良牙のプロポーズ
Ryoga`s Proposal
Roland se jette à l`eau
Ryouga no Propose
episode.summary: After being saved from a pack of wolves by Ryoga, the Ghost Cat decides to repay the debt by possessing him and proposing to Akane.

episode.title: 你好[ニーハオ]!呪泉郷のガイドさん
Nihao! Jusenkyo Guide
Suivez le guide
Nihao! Jusenkyou no Guide-san
episode.summary: The Jusenkyo guide shows up in Japan! He will perform a ceremony which will tap the water table that is the source of the "Spring of Drowned Man" to where there is a new Jusenkyo spring in Japan! Where is that spring? Naturally, it`s the pond directly outside the Tendo dining room.

episode.title: そのおさげ もらったぁ!
Gimme That Pigtail
Il s`en est fallu d`un cheveu (1)
Sono Osage Morattaa!
episode.summary: Why are there strange small men running around chopping off people`s pigtails? And what`s the Dragon Whisker? What is Ranma hiding...?

episode.title: あかね, 涙の水泳大特訓
Swimming with Psychos
La leçon de natation
Akane, Namida no Suiei Daitokkun
episode.summary: Akane is chosen to represent the the school in the regional swimming contest, not telling anyone she doesn`t know how. Luckily, the Principal is there to "help" her learn.

episode.title: 史上サイテーの賭け
The Dumbest Bet in History!
Le plus grand tricheur de tous les temps
Shijou Saitee no Kake
episode.summary: 10 years ago, Ranma gambled away the Tendo Dojo. Now the "Gambling King" has come to collect, and Ranma has to win it back. However, in spite of his name, the King is so bad at gambling he only manages to beat children. Sadly, that provides little comfort as Ranma`s even worse...

episode.title: 格闘将棋は命懸け
Shogi Showdown
Grandeur nature
Kakutou Shougi wa Inochigake
episode.summary: A master of the mysterious martial art of Battle Shogi seeks out Genma, demanding a rematch for the defeat that cost him the respect of his wife. When Genma "wins" again, the man decides to turn the entire lawn into a gigantic Shogi board...

episode.title: ミーが九能のダディです
Me Is Kuno`s Daddy, Me Is
Le père de Julian
Me ga Kunou no Daddy Desu
episode.summary: When the Principal starts going on about his long lost son, Sasuke starts to have his suspicions. But can get to the bottom of this as the school is turned into a war zone by the Principal`s "Get out of all school rules" class tournament fight.

episode.title: 気分しだいの必殺技 (後)
From the Depths of Despair, Part II
Chacun sa méthode
Kibunshidai no Hissatsu Waza (Kouhen)
episode.summary: To perfect the dangerous Shishi Hoko-Dan technique, one must travel to the depths of despair. Where Ryoga lives most of the time anyway! But why is Ranma trying to make Ryoga even more miserable?!

episode.title: シャンプー囚われのキッス
Shampoo`s Cursed Kiss
L`enlèvement
Shampoo Toraware no Kiss
episode.summary: "Be my bri-i-i-i-i-de----!!" It`s been awhile, but at last the "Ghost Cat" has come back... and he won`t release Shampoo until she agrees to marry him! Can Ranma prevent the "cat`s trophy"?

episode.title: 青い恐怖にボンジュール
Madam St. Paul`s Cry for Help
La liqueur bleue
Aoi Kyoufu ni Bonjour
episode.summary: A vat of forbidden, blue wine is having a strange effect on Picolet Chardin, that memorable, masterful monsieur of martial-arts dining. Fearing for her charge, Madame St. Paul askes for help...though she may wish she hadn`t.

episode.title: 五寸釘光, ひと夏の恋
Gosunkugi`s Summer Affair!
La luciole
Gosunkugi Hikaru, Hitonatsu no Koi
episode.summary: The ever-so-morose Hikaru Gosunkugi has met the girl of his dreams. The weird thing is, she even seems to like him back! The trouble is, the girl is Kogane, the teenage ghost. What can Ranma and Akane possibly do to make this ghostly love story work?

episode.title: 必殺! 地獄のゆりかご
The Cradle from Hell
Le berceau infernal
Hissatsu! Jigoku no Yurikago
episode.summary: In the life of every father, there must eventually come a time when the son challenges his authority, tests his own strength, declares himself a man. But is Cup Ramen worth losing your dad for?

episode.title: 愛の格闘チアガール (後)
Bring It On! Love as a Cheerleader, Part 2
Le concours (2)
Ai no Kakutou Cheergirl (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Ranma`s got the basic moves down, sure, and that uniform really is cute, but then it turns out that it`s Kuno`s kendo match he has to cheer for. No way! Worse, Mariko`s crush on the so-called "Blue Thunder" means the only way Ranma can win-and avenge Akane`s honor-is to somehow best Mariko in a cheerleading contest. Under these circumstances, how cheerful can Ranma be expected to be?!

episode.title: 一つ召しませ恋の桜餅
Wretched Rice Cakes of Love
Le plateau magique
Hitotsu Meshimase Koi no Sakuramochi
episode.summary: It is said, if he who eats of the "cherry blossom rice-cake" is meant to be with you forever, the mark of the sakura shall appear on his forehead, but if he is not....

episode.title: キノコ寺へ行こう
Let`s Go to the Mushroom Temple
Les champignons de l`amour
Kinokodera e Ikou
episode.summary: "The soul of the mushroom is the soul of the Earth," or so it`s said by those in the know. Love mushrooms... poison mushrooms... can a relationship based on fungus survive among us?

episode.title: ボクと駆け落ちして下さい
Run Away with Me, Ranma
Souvenir d`antan
Boku to Kakeochi Shite Kudasai
episode.summary: A recurring dream...a romantic couple...their destiny, somehow tied to the blooming cherry blossoms. Ranma gets roped into helping a ghost "have not regrets" before shuffling off this mortal coil. But the ties that bind can be stubborn...

episode.title: 天道家・龍神伝説
The Tendo Dragon Legend
La légende du dragon
Tendouke Ryuujin Densetsu
episode.summary: Ranma and Akane find a seahorse looking thing and they take it back to the dojo. Dr Tofu says that this seahorse thing will grow into a dragon with awesome powers so now there are those who want it.

episode.title: 迷惑! 六人の八宝斉
Pick-a-Peck o` Happosai
Ernestin est partout
Meiwaku! Rokunin no Happousai
episode.summary: A pack of magical, powerful cards has fallen into the wrong hands, and now Happosai is several times as much a pain as before! It was bad enough when there was just one of him - now there are six!

episode.title: 爆裂! ハイパーツヅミ
The Musical Instruments of Destruction
Un tambour tombé du ciel
Bakuretsu! Hyper Tsuzumi
episode.summary: During an annual cleaning of the estate, Kuno comes across an ancient taiko drum that`s got the devasting power of a howitzer. And what good is a weapon if you don`t turn it on your friends, right? As if that weren`t enough, now Kodachi`s got an equally devastating lute...which she promptly turns over to the principal. Cue the music!

episode.title: 黄金の茶器, 五重塔の決戦
Battle for the Golden Tea Set!
La théière en or
Ougon no Chaki, Gojuunotou no Kessen
episode.summary: Once again, it`s return of Martial Arts Tea Ceremony master, Sentaro. The whole incident seems to be over some treasured tea set that rival schools have fought over for generations, and now it`s Sentaro`s turn to prove his worth!

episode.title: 織姫は流れ星に乗って
Meet You in the Milky Way
La voie lactée
Orihime wa Nagareboshi ni Notte
episode.summary: Held every year on July 7th, Japan`s "tanabata" festival celebrates the celestial reunion of the Weaver Princess and her beau, the Cowherd. When the two descend from the sky, their story seems suddenly so much less romantic....

episode.title: できた! 八宝大カビン
The Horrible Happo-Mold Burst!
Les bombes du maître
Dekita! Happodaikabin
episode.summary: Happosai`s always relied on his "Happo Fire-Burst" technique to get what he want, but on rainy days its lost efectiveness, so he discover a new ultimate "mold" weapon ....

episode.title: 九能兄妹スキャンダルの嵐
The Kuno Sibling Scandal!
L`album manquant
Kunou Kyoudai Scandal no Arashi
episode.summary: Oh those wacky, squabbling, Kuno siblings. Tatewaki (age seventeen) is in love with girl-type Ranma, while Kodachi (a.k.a "the Black Rose") adores the boy-type. Brought to blows by jealousy, where`s King Solomon where you need him?

episode.title: 忍の犬は白と黒
A Ninja`s Dog Is Black and White
Le sauveur
Shinobi no Inu wa Shiro to Kuro
episode.summary: Big trouble for Ryoga when a dog he saved repays him by delivering a love letter to Akane. A letter he didn`t mean to send.

episode.title: 愛の格闘チアガール (前)
Bring It On! Love as a Cheerleader, Part 1
Le concours (1)
Ai no Kakutou Cheergirl (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Having learned (or been the victim of) almost any martial-arts style imaginable, Ranma`s never-the-less about to learn a whole new one: Martial-Arts Cheerleading! Mariko Konjo, pep leader extraordinaire, is fixing to put a hurt on Akane... and Ranma can`t allow that. But is he willing to pick up a pair of pom-poms to stop her?

episode.title: 決定! ミス・ビーチサイド
The Battle for Miss Beachside
L`élection de miss océan
Kettei! Miss Beachside
episode.summary: This is like no bathing-suit competition you`ve ever seen! The contestants are Akane, Shampoo, Ukyo and Kodachi ... plus girl-type Ranma, and Tsubasa Kurenai to boot. Knowing these girls, it`s going to be one hot competition!

episode.title: いつの日か, きっと...
Boy Meets Mom, Part 2: Someday, Somehow...
Un jour peut-être (2)
Itsu no Hi ka, Kitto...
episode.summary: Ranma is Ranma-Chan and Genma is a big panda so they do get to see Ranma`s mom. After a few days she decides it`s time to leave but Akane won`t let this happen. With Genma distracted she arranges for Ranma to meet his mom.

episode.title: ラヴ・シーカー CAN`T STOP IT
Opening 6
Love Seeker CAN`T STOP IT
天道家のおよびでない奴ら!
Tendo Family`s Annoying Acquaintances
Tendouke no Oyobidenai Yatsura!
らんま1/2 DoCoミュージックビデオ
DoCo Music Video
Ranma 1/2 DoCo Music Video
